transcript:
here's a really really simple strategy
to be successful write down all of your
goals reason why I say that is because
Harvard did a study in the 1970s with
all of their graduating class and found
out that only three percent of those
students who were graduating wrote down
their goals but 10 years later they
followed up with all of those students
and found out that the three percent
that wrote down their goals were more
than 10 times more successful than the
entire 97 percent combined that didn't
write down their goals and so that
brings the question why is that well
because when you write down your goals
it makes them real it makes them
physically exist in this world and when
it's on paper it makes it so much easier
to be planned so if somebody wants to be
really successful it's real simple just
start by writing down your goals
